TEXT: The applicant , ORG , is a NORP citzen , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . She is represented before the ORG by PERSON PERSON and PERSON , lawyers practising in PERSON . The respondent Government are represented by their Agents , PERSON PERSON and Ms Š. PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
In DATE several plots of agricultural land were confiscated from the applicant 's father .

On DATE ORG passed a law , which enabled former owners of confiscated or nationalised property to seek either restitution of or compensation for the property taken from them ( “ the LAW ” ) . It also provided that within DATE from its enactment the competent ministers were to issue relevant instructions on the implementation of that Act .
LAW entered into force on DATE .
On DATE the applicant filed a request with the GPE , ORG , ORG ( “ the NORP ” ) , seeking restitution of , or compensation for , property taken from her late father .

On DATE the ORG accepted the applicant 's request in part granting her state bonds as compensation for the property taken . The exact amount of the indemnities offered to the applicant was to be established after the enactment of the competent instructions . However , no such instructions had been adopted by the competent minister at that time .
On DATE the applicant appealed against that decision . On DATE ORG ( ORG pravosuđa ) dismissed the applicant 's appeal in part . The first instance decision thereby became final .

The applicant subsequently filed an administrative action against the ORG 's decision . On DATE ORG ( Upravni sud PERSON ) accepted the applicant 's action and quashed that decision . It appears that the case is still pending before ORG as the second instance authority .

Meanwhile , on DATE ORG ( ORG financija ) adopted the Rules on the Criteria for the Determination of the Compensation for Confiscated Building Land and Business Premises ( PERSON o mjerilima za utvrđivanje naknade za oduzeto građevinsko zemljište i poslovni prostor , ORG no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , CARDINAL ; “ the Rules ” ) . The Rules have been applicable since DATE .

Section CARDINAL of the Act on Compensation for , and Restitution of , Property Taken under ORG ( Zakon o naknadi za imovinu oduzetu za ORG jugoslavenske komunističke vladavine , ORG nos . CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL/CARDINAL , CARDINAL ) provides that the Act applies to former owners and their statutory heirs who are relatives of the first degree .

Sections CARDINAL and CARDINAL , inter alia , oblige the Minister of Finances to issue further instructions for the assessment of value of the property for which compensation is to be granted within DATE from the enactment of LAW .

Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL of the Administrative Procedure Act ( Zakon o općem upravnom postupku , ORG no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) provides that an administrative decision is executed once it becomes enforceable . LAW of the same provision provides the cases in which a first instance decision exceptionally may become enforceable , whereas paragraph CARDINAL provides that a second instance decision become enforceable on DATE of the service on the party .
